original: @1b #// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
analyzed: @1b #// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
translated: Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po brgya don bdun pa /
analyzed: bam po brgya don bdun pa /
translated: One hundred and seventy-second section

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnam par dag pas gzugs rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnam par dag pas gzugs rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of form is due to the purity of the noble eightfold path.

original: gzugs rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam @2a #//
analyzed: gzugs rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste / de ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam @2a #//
translated: The purity of the knowledge of all aspects is due to the purity of form.

original: par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purity of the noble eightfold path and the purity of form and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: are not divided, are not broken apart, are not cut apart, and are not otherwise.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnam par dag pas tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnam par dag pas tshor ba rnam par dag pa /

original: tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste; de ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnam par dag pa dang / tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /🔽gnyis su byar med so so ma yin @2b tha mi dad do //
analyzed: tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste; de ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnam par dag pa dang / tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de / gnyis su byar med so so ma yin @2b tha mi dad do //
translated: The purity of the noble eightfold path and the purity of consciousness are not two, nor are they divided.🔽The purity of the noble eightfold path and the purity of the eye are not two, nor are they divided.🔽The purity of the noble eightfold path and the purity of the ear are not two, nor are they divided.🔽The purity of the noble eightfold path and the purity of the nose are not two, nor are they divided.🔽The purity of the noble eightfold path and the purity of the tongue are not two, nor are they divided.🔽The purity of the noble eightfold path and the purity of the body are not two, nor are they divided.🔽The purity of the noble eightfold path and the purity of the mind are not two, nor are they divided.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnam par dag pas 'du shes rnam par dag pa /🔽'du shes rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnam par dag pa dang; 'du shes rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: The purity of the noble eightfold path and the purity of the body constituent are not two, nor are they divided.🔽The purity of the noble eightfold path

analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams par dag pas 'du byed rnam par dag pa /

analyzed: 'du byed rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /

translated: Thus, the purification of the noble eightfold path and the purification of volitional factors and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects are not two,

analyzed: med de / gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //

translated: Thus, Subhuti, the purity of the noble eightfold path and the purity of the tongue sense-sphere and the purity of the knowledge of all modes are not two nor divided, not separated, not broken apart.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: they are not two, nor are they divided.🔽The purification of the faculty of the mind is the purification of the power of the mind.🔽The purification of the power of the mind is the purification of the faculty of the mind.🔽Thus, the purification of the faculty of the mind and the purification of the power of the mind are indivisible:🔽they are not two, nor are they divided.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnam par dag pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnam par dag pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /

analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /

translated: Thus, the purity of the noble eightfold path and the purity of the condition of tactile contact occurring through the coming together of the body are indivisible, not to be divided into two as pure and impure.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: It is indivisible, not to be divided into two as pure and impure.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the condition of mental contact occurring through the coming together of the mind is the purity of the noble eightfold path.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is mind-based is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa @8b nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa @8b nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purity of the noble eightfold path, the purity of the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is mind-based, and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are indivisible.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not two, nor are they divided.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par dag pas gzugs rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par dag pas gzugs rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the noble truths is the purity of form.

original: gzugs rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of form is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purity of the noble truths, the purity of form, and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are indivisible.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: it is not two and not divided.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par dag pas tshor ba rnam par dag pa /

analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: Thus, the purity of the noble truths and the purity of feeling and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two and are not divided.

analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //

translated: Thus, this purification of the noble truths, this purification of volitional factors, and this purification of the knowledge of all aspects are not two,

original: de ltar na bsam gtan rnam par dag pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //

translated: The purity of the sense-field of the tongue is the purity of the immeasurables.🔽The purity of the sense-field of the tongue is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽Thus, the purity of the immeasurables and the purity of the sense-field of the tongue and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are without duality and not made dual, are not separate and not cut off.

original: tshad med pa rnam par dag pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnam par dag pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the sense-­faculties is the purity of the sense-­fields.🔽The purity of the sense-­fields is the purity of the sense-­bases.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen @22b pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen @22b pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the sense-­bases is the purity of the aggregates.🔽The purity of the aggregates is the purity of the elements.

original: de ltar na tshad med pa rnam par dag pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /🔽gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //🔽tshad med pa rnam par dag pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: de ltar na tshad med pa rnam par dag pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de / gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do // tshad med pa rnam par dag pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the elements is the purity of the sense-­faculties.🔽The purity of the sense-­faculties is the purity of the sense-­fields.🔽The purity of the sense-­fields is the purity of the sense-­bases.🔽The purity of the sense-­bases is the purity of the aggregates.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the aggregates is the purity of the elements.🔽The purity of the elements is the purity of dependent origination.🔽The purity of dependent origination is the purity of the past.🔽The purity of the past is the purity of the future.🔽The purity of the future is the purity of the present.🔽The purity of the present is the purity of the three times.🔽The purity of the three times is the purity of the past.🔽The purity of the past is the purity of the future.🔽The purity of the future is the purity of the present.🔽The purity of the present is the purity of the three times.🔽The purity of the three times is the purity of the past.🔽The purity of the past is the purity of the future.🔽The purity of the future is the purity of the present.🔽The purity of the present is the purity of the three times.🔽The purity of the three times is the purity of the past.🔽The purity of the past is the purity of the future.🔽The purity of the future is the purity of the present.🔽The purity of the present is the purity of the three times.🔽The purity of the three times is the purity of the past.🔽The purity of the past is the purity of the future.🔽The purity of the future is the purity of the present.🔽The purity of the present is the purity of the three times.🔽The purity of the three times is the purity of the past.🔽The purity of the past is the purity of the future.🔽The purity of the future is the purity of the present.🔽The purity of the present is the purity of the three times.🔽The purity of

original: de ltar na tshad med pa rnam par dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na tshad med pa rnam par dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: “The purity of the aggregate of body is the purity of the aggregate of feeling.🔽The purity of the aggregate of feeling is the purity of the aggregate of perception.🔽Thus, the purity of the aggregate of body and the purity of the aggregate of feeling are indivisible.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: There is no duality in them, no division, no discrimination.

original: tshad med pa rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: “The purity of the aggregate of perception is the purity of the aggregate of formation.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the aggregate of formation is the purity of the aggregate of consciousness.🔽Thus, the purity of the aggregate of body and the purity of the aggregate of feeling are indivisible.

original: de ltar na tshad med pa rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de; gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: de ltar na tshad med pa rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de; gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: There is no duality in them, no division, no discrimination.

original: tshad med pa rnam par dag pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnam par dag pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: “The purity of the aggregate of consciousness is the purity of the eye sense field.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the sense field of phenomena is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽Thus, the purity of the immeasurables and the purity of the sense field of phenomena are indivisible—🔽they cannot be separated, they cannot be differentiated, and they are not distinct.

original: de ltar na tshad med pa rnam par dag pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / @23a *//
analyzed: de ltar na tshad med pa rnam par dag pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / @23a *//
translated: “The purity of the sense field of phenomena is the purity of the knowledge of paths.🔽The purity of the knowledge of paths is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purity of the immeasurables and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are indivisible—

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: they cannot be separated, they cannot be differentiated, and they are not distinct.🔽“The purity of the sense field of phenomena is the purity of the sense field of mental phenomena.🔽The purity of the sense field of mental phenomena is the purity of the sense field of the mind.🔽The purity of the sense field of the mind is the purity of the sense field of eye consciousness.🔽The purity of the sense field of eye consciousness is the purity of the sense field of ear consciousness.🔽The purity of the sense field of ear consciousness is the purity of the sense field of nose consciousness.🔽The purity of the sense field of nose consciousness is the purity of the sense field of tongue consciousness.🔽The purity of the sense field of tongue consciousness is the purity of the sense field of body consciousness.🔽The purity of the sense field of body consciousness is the purity of the sense field of mind consciousness.🔽The purity of the sense field of mind consciousness is the purity of the sense field of form.🔽The purity of the sense field of form is the purity of the sense field of sound.🔽The purity of the sense field of sound is the purity of the sense field of smell.🔽The purity of the sense field of smell is the purity of the sense field of taste.🔽The purity of the sense field of taste is the purity of the sense field of tangibles.

original: tshad med pa rnam par dag pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnam par dag pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the sense field of tangibles is the purity of the sense field of mental phenomena.🔽The purity of the sense field of mental phenomena is the purity of the realm of desire.🔽The purity of the realm of desire is the purity of the realm of form.🔽The purity of the realm of form is the purity of the formless realm.🔽The purity of the formless realm is the purity of the realm of space.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the realm of space is the purity of the realm of consciousness.🔽The

original: de ltar na tshad med pa rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na tshad med pa rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purity of immeasurable [attainments] and the purity of the sensory element of the nose are indivisible.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not two and cannot be made two.🔽“The purity of immeasurable [attainments] is the purity of the sensory element of the tongue.🔽The purity of the sensory element of the tongue is the purity of the sensory element of the body.

original: tshad med pa rnam par dag pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnam par dag pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: Thus, the purity of immeasurable [attainments] and the purity of the sensory element of the tongue are indivisible.🔽They are not two and cannot be made two.🔽“The purity of immeasurable [attainments] is the purity of the sensory element of the body.🔽The purity of the sensory element of the body is the purity of the sensory element of the mental faculty.🔽Thus, the purity of immeasurable [attainments] and the purity of the sensory element of the body are indivisible.🔽They are not two and cannot be made two.🔽“The purity of immeasurable [attainments] is the purity of the sensory element of the mental faculty.🔽The purity of the sensory element of the mental faculty is the purity of the sensory element of phenomena.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: Thus, the purity of immeasurable [attainments] and the purity of the sensory element of the mental faculty are indivisible.🔽They are not two and cannot be made two.🔽“The purity of immeasurable [attainments] is the purity of the sensory element of phenomena.🔽The purity of the sensory element of phenomena is the purity of the sensory element of visual consciousness.🔽Thus, the purity of immeasurable [attainments] and the purity of the sensory element of phenomena are indivisible.🔽They are not two and cannot be made two.🔽“The purity of immeasurable [attainments] is the purity of the sensory element of visual consciousness.🔽The purity of the sensory element of visual consciousness is the purity of the sensory element of auditory consciousness.

original: de ltar na tshad med pa rnam par dag pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na tshad med pa rnam par dag pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purity of immeasurable [attainments] and the purity of the sensory element of visual consciousness are indivisible.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not two and cannot be made two.🔽“The

original: tshad med pa rnam par dag pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnam par dag pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the sense field of the tongue is the purity of the sense field of tastes.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na tshad med pa rnam par dag pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba @23b rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste / de ltar na tshad med pa rnam par dag pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba @23b rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: The purity of the sense field of tastes is the purity of the sense field of the tongue.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //🔽tshad med pa rnam par dag pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do // tshad med pa rnam par dag pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: Thus, this purity of the sense field of the tongue and the purity of the sense field of tastes are not two and cannot be divided into two.🔽“The purity of the sense field of the body is the purity of the sense field of tangibles.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the sense field of tangibles is the purity of the sense field of the body.

original: de ltar na tshad med pa rnam par dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na tshad med pa rnam par dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, immeasurable purity and the purity of the sense-­perception-­contact-­occasioned feeling are one thing, and the purity of the knowledge of all modes another,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: but although they are one in this way, still they are not one in the sense of nondifferentiation.

original: tshad med pa rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the sense-­perception-­contact-­occasioned feeling in the mind is the purity of the immeasurable.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the sense-­perception-­contact-­occasioned feeling in the mind is the purity of the knowledge of all modes.

original: de ltar na tshad med pa rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na tshad med pa rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, immeasurable purity and the purity of the sense-­perception-­contact-­occasioned feeling in the mind are one thing, and the purity of the knowledge of all modes another,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do ////
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do ////
translated: but although they are one in this way, still they are not one in the sense of nondifferentiation.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
translated: Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po brgya don brgyad pa /
analyzed: bam po brgya don brgyad pa /
translated: Volume 108

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pas gzugs rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pas gzugs rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of form is due to the purity of the formless meditative stabilizations.

original: gzugs rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na gzugs med pa'i @24a *//
analyzed: gzugs rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste / de ltar na gzugs med pa'i @24a *//
translated: The purity of the knowledge of all aspects is due to the purity of form.

original: snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purity of the formless meditative stabilizations and the purity of form and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not broken apart, not separated, and not cut apart.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pas tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pas tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of feeling is due to the purity of the formless meditative stabilizations.

original: tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the knowledge of all aspects is due to the purity of feeling.

original: de ltar na gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pa dang / tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pa dang / tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purification of the formless-absorptions, the purification of feelings, and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects are without two and cannot be divided into two.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not broken apart, not cut apart, and not fractured.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pas 'du shes rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pas 'du shes rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purification of the formless-absorptions is the purification of perceptions.

original: 'du shes rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: 'du shes rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purification of perceptions is the purification of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pa dang / 'du shes rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pa dang / 'du shes rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purification of the formless-absorptions, the purification of perceptions, and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects are without two and cannot be divided into two.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not broken apart, not cut apart, and not fractured.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pas 'du byed rnam par dag pa; 'du byed rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pas 'du byed rnam par dag pa; 'du byed rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: the purity of volitional factors, and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pa dang / 'du byed rnam par dag pa @24b dang; rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med do /
analyzed: de ltar na gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pa dang / 'du byed rnam par dag pa @24b dang; rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med do /
translated: Thus, Subhūti, the purity of the formless meditative stabilizations and the purity of volitional factors and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two, are not sundered, are not broken apart, and do not become separated.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not two, are not sundered, are not broken apart, and do not become separated.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pas rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pas rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the formless meditative stabilizations is the purity of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of consciousness is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purification of the formless-absorptions, the purification of consciousness, and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects are without two and not divided.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not broken apart, not different.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pas mig rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pas mig rnam par dag pa /
translated: “The purification of the formless-absorptions is the purification of the eyes.

original: mig rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: mig rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purification of the eyes is the purification of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pa dang / mig rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pa dang / mig rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purification of the formless-absorptions, the purification of the eyes, and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects are without two and not divided.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //

translated: Thus, Subhūti, the purity of the formless absorptions and the purity of the sensory element of the tongue and the purity of omniscience are one thing in two parts.

analyzed: rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: Thus, liberation and the purity of consciousness are not two nor divided.

translated: Liberation is the purification of eye contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na rnam par thar pa rnam par dag pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste / de ltar na rnam par thar pa rnam par dag pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: The purity of the sense-field of the eye is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: @33a *// gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: @33a *// gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: Thus, the purity of liberation and the purity of the sense-field of the eye and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are without duality and cannot be made dual, are not separate and not distinct.

original: rnam par thar pa rnam par dag pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnam par dag pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of liberation is the purity of the sense-field of the ear.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the sense-field of the ear is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na rnam par thar pa rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na rnam par thar pa rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purity of liberation and the purity of the sense-field of the ear and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are without duality and cannot be made dual, are not separate and not distinct.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not two, nor are they divided.🔽The purity of the sense-field of the nose is the purity of the sensory element of the nose.🔽The purity of the sensory element of the nose is the purity of the sensory element of smell.

original: rnam par thar pa rnam par dag pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnam par dag pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the sensory element of smell is the purity of the sensory element of olfactory consciousness.🔽The purity of the sensory element of olfactory consciousness is the purity of the sensory element of the tongue.🔽The purity of the sensory element of the tongue is the purity of the sensory element of taste.🔽The purity of the sensory element of taste is the purity of the sensory element of gustatory consciousness.🔽The purity of the sensory element of gustatory consciousness is the purity of the sensory element of the body.🔽The purity of the sensory element of the body is the purity of the sensory element of tangibles.🔽The purity of the sensory element of tangibles is the purity of the sensory element of tactile consciousness.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /

translated: they are not two, nor are they divided.🔽The purification of the serial absorptions is the purification of the sensory element of the mental faculty.🔽The purification of the sensory element of the mental faculty is the purification of the sensory element of mental consciousness.🔽The purification of the sensory element of mental consciousness is the purification of the perfection of wisdom.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purification of the perfection of wisdom is the purification of the emptiness of internal phenomena.🔽The purification of the emptiness of internal phenomena is the purification of the emptiness of external phenomena.🔽The purification of the emptiness of external phenomena is the purification of the emptiness of both internal and external phenomena.🔽The purification of the emptiness of both internal and external phenomena is the purification of the emptiness of emptiness.🔽The purification of the emptiness of emptiness is the purification of the emptiness of great extent.🔽The purification of the emptiness of great extent is the purification of the emptiness of ultimate reality.🔽The purification of the emptiness of ultimate reality is the purification of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.🔽The purification of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena is the purification of the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.🔽The purification of the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena is the purification of the emptiness of the unlimited.🔽The purification of the emptiness of the unlimited is the purification of the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end.🔽The purification of the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end is the purification of the emptiness of non-dispersal.🔽The purification of the emptiness of non-dispersal is the purification of the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The purification of the emptiness of inherent existence is the purification of the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽The purification of the emptiness of all phenomena is the purification of the emptiness of its own characteristics.🔽The purification of the emptiness of its own characteristics is the purification of the emptiness of other-entity.🔽The purification of the emptiness of other-entity is the purification of the emptiness of non-apprehension.

analyzed: mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pas 'du shes rnam par dag pa /

analyzed: 'du byed rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /

translated: Thus, the purity of the gateway to liberation of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness, the purity of volitional factors, and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two,🔽are not divided, and are not differentiated.

analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //

analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pas rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /

analyzed: rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /

translated: Thus, the purity of the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation, the purity of consciousness, and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: nor are they divided.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pas mig rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pas mig rnam par dag pa /
translated: The eye is pure because of the purity of the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation.

translated: The purity of the eye is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: pa rnam par dag pa dang / mig rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: pa rnam par dag pa dang / mig rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purity of the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates to liberation, the purity of the eye, and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not broken apart, not cut apart, not fractured, and not separated.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pas rna ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pas rna ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates to liberation is the purity of the ear.

original: rna ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: rna ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the ear is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

analyzed: de ltar na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de / gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: Thus, emptiness, the absence of attributes, and the absence of aspiration—the doors to liberation—are pure, the ears are pure, and the knowledge of all aspects is pure. In this way, emptiness, the absence of attributes, and the absence of aspiration—the doors to liberation—and the ears are not two and are not divided.

original: rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pas sna rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pas sna rnam par dag pa /
translated: The doors to liberation—emptiness, the absence of attributes, and the absence of aspiration—are pure, the nose is pure, and the knowledge of all aspects is pure.🔽Thus, the doors to liberation—emptiness, the absence of attributes, and the absence of aspiration—and the nose are not two and are not divided.

original: sna rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: sna rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The doors to liberation—emptiness, the absence of attributes, and the absence of aspiration—are pure, the tongue is pure, and the knowledge of all aspects is pure.🔽Thus, the doors to liberation—emptiness, the absence of attributes, and the absence of aspiration—and the tongue are not two and are not divided.🔽The doors to liberation—emptiness, the absence of attributes, and the absence of aspiration—are pure, the body is pure, and the knowledge of all aspects is pure.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not two, nor are they divided.

translated: The purification of the tongue and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects are indivisible.

analyzed: lus rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /

original: de ltar na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pa dang / lus rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

translated: Thus, emptiness, the gateway to liberation, signlessness, the gateway to liberation, and wishlessness, the gateway to liberation, are pure, the body is pure, and the knowledge of all aspects is pure. In this there is no duality.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: There is no duality because there is no differentiation.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pas yid rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pas yid rnam par dag pa /
translated: The gateway to liberation, emptiness, the gateway to liberation, signlessness, and the gateway to liberation, wishlessness, are pure, and the mind is pure.

translated: Thus, the gateway to liberation, emptiness, the gateway to liberation, signlessness, and the gateway to liberation, wishlessness, are pure, the mind is pure, and the knowledge of all aspects is pure. In this there is no duality.

translated: The emptiness gate of liberation is pure, the signless gate of liberation is pure, the wishless gate of liberation is pure, and form is pure.

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de / gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: Since form is pure, the knowledge of all aspects is pure. analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang; smon pa med pa rnam par dag pas ro rnam par dag pa /

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag @46a *//🔽pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag @46a *// pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation are pure.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the tongue sense-sphere is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purity of the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation, the purity of the tongue sense-sphere, and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two and cannot be made two.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not distinct and not different.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation is the purity of the body sense-sphere.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /🔽gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste / de ltar na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de / gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: The purity of the knowledge of all aspects is due to the purity of the sensory contact of the body.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /🔽yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /🔽yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: Thus, the purity of the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation, the purity of the sensory contact of the body, and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects: these are not two, not divided, not broken apart, not different.

original: de ltar na rnam par thar @46b pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na rnam par thar @46b pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: In this there is no duality,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: no differentiation, and no exclusion.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness as doors to liberation is the purity of the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, emptiness, the gateway to liberation, signlessness, the gateway to liberation, and wishlessness, the gateway to liberation, are indivisible:

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //🔽rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do // rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: they are not two, nor are they three.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the gateway to liberation that is emptiness, the gateway to liberation that is signlessness, and the gateway to liberation that is wishlessness is the purity of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact that is the coming together of ear, a phenomenon, and the consciousness of a phenomenon.🔽The purity of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact that is the coming together of ear, a phenomenon, and the consciousness of a phenomenon is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor @47a *//
analyzed: de ltar na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor @47a *//
translated: Since the sensory element of phenomena is pure, the sensory element of mental consciousness is pure.🔽Since the sensory element of mental consciousness is pure, the perfection of wisdom is pure.🔽Since the perfection of wisdom is pure, the perfection of meditative concentration is pure.

original: ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /🔽gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de / gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: Since the perfection of meditative concentration is pure, the perfection of perseverance is pure.🔽Since the perfection of perseverance is pure, the perfection of patience is pure.🔽Since the perfection of patience is pure, the perfection of morality is pure.🔽Since the perfection of morality is pure, the perfection of generosity is pure.🔽Since the perfection of generosity is pure, the emptiness of internal phenomena is pure.🔽Since the emptiness of internal phenomena is pure, the emptiness of external phenomena is pure.🔽Since the emptiness of external phenomena is pure, the emptiness of both internal and external phenomena is pure.🔽Since the emptiness of both internal and external phenomena is pure, the emptiness of emptiness is pure.🔽Since the emptiness of emptiness is pure, the emptiness of great extent is pure.🔽Since the emptiness of great extent is pure, the emptiness of ultimate reality is pure.🔽Since the emptiness of ultimate reality is pure, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena is pure.🔽Since the emptiness of conditioned phenomena is pure, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena is pure.🔽Since the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena is pure, the emptiness of the unlimited is pure.🔽Since the emptiness of the unlimited is pure, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end is pure.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: Since the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end is pure, the emptiness of nonrepudiation is pure.🔽Since the emptiness of nonrepudiation is pure, the emptiness of inherent existence is pure.🔽Since the emptiness of inherent existence is pure, the emptiness of all phenomena is pure.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: Since the emptiness of all phenomena is pure, the emptiness of specific characteristics is pure.🔽Since

original: de ltar na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pa dang; sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pa dang; sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, emptiness as a gateway to liberation, signlessness as a gateway to liberation, wishlessness as a gateway to liberation, the purification of the tactile sensations that arise from the contact of the body with its objects, and the purification of omniscience are indivisible.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not two, nor are they divided.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purification of the tactile sensations that arise from the contact of the body with its objects is due to the purification of emptiness as a gateway to liberation, signlessness as a gateway to liberation, and wishlessness as a gateway to liberation.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purification of omniscience is due to the purification of the tactile sensations that arise from the contact of the body with its objects.

analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: In this way, Śāradvatīputra, the sensory element of mental consciousness is purified.🔽In this way, Śārad

analyzed: de ltar na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, emptiness, the gateway to liberation, signlessness, the gateway to liberation, and wishlessness, the gateway to liberation, are pure, and the resultant feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is dependent on the body is pure, and the knowledge of all aspects is pure.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: It is indivisible, not two, and cannot be made two.🔽The purity of the sense fields is the purity of the eye.

analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pas gzugs rnam par dag @49b pa; gzugs rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the eye is the purity of the sense fields.🔽Thus, the purity of the sense fields and the purity of the eye are indivisible, not two, and cannot be made two.🔽The purity of the sense fields is the purity of the ear.🔽The purity of the ear is the purity of the sense fields.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: Thus, the purity of the sense fields and the purity of the nose are indivisible, not two, and cannot be made two.🔽The purity of the sense fields is the purity of the tongue.

analyzed: sgra rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the body is the purity of the sense fields.🔽Thus, the purity of the sense fields and the purity of the body are indivisible, not two, and cannot be made two.🔽The purity of the sense fields is the purity of the mind.🔽The purity of the mind is the purity of the sense fields.

analyzed: de ltar na mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / sgra rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

original: mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pas lus kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa; lus kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /

translated: The purity of the superknowledges is the purity of the consciousness of the sense of the body. The purity of the consciousness of the sense of the body is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa rnam @51a *//
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa rnam @51a *//
translated: Thus, the purity of the superknowledges and the purity of the consciousness of the sense of the body and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two,🔽nor are they divided.

original: par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: The purification of the sense fields and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects are indivisible.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not two, nor are they divided.

original: mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purification of the sense fields and the purification of the mental consciousness are indivisible.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purification of the mental consciousness and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects are indivisible.

original: de ltar na mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purification of the sense fields and the purification of the mental consciousness and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects are indivisible.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //🔽mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do // mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: They are not two, nor are they divided.🔽The purification of the sense fields and the purification of eye contact are indivisible.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purification of eye contact and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects are indivisible.

original: de ltar na mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /🔽gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de / gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: Thus, the purification of the superknowledges and the purification of the sensory domain of eye contact are one thing, not two, not divided.

original: mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purification of the superknowledges and the purification of the sensory domain of ear contact are one thing, not two, not divided.🔽The purification of the superknowledges and the purification of the sensory domain of nose contact are one thing, not two, not divided.

original: de ltar na mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad @51b mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag ba 'di la gnyis su med de /🔽gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad @51b mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag ba 'di la gnyis su med de / gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: The purification of the superknowledges and the purification of the sensory domain of tongue contact are one thing, not two, not divided.🔽The purification of the superknowledges and the purification of the sensory domain of body contact are one thing, not two, not divided.

original: mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purification of the superknowledges and the purification of the sensory domain of thought contact are one thing, not two, not divided.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the superknowledges is the purity of the sense-sphere of the tongue, and the purity of the sense-sphere of the tongue is the purity of the knowledge of all modes.

original: de ltar na mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /🔽gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de / gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: Thus, the purity of the superknowledges, the purity of the sense-sphere of the tongue, and the purity of the knowledge of all modes are not two and not divided, not broken apart, not cut apart, not different.🔽The purity of the superknowledges is the purity of the sense-sphere of the body, and the purity of the sense-sphere of the body is the purity of the knowledge of all modes.🔽Thus, the purity of the superknowledges, the purity of the sense-sphere of the body, and the purity of the knowledge of all modes are not two and not divided, not broken apart, not cut apart, not different.

original: mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa; lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa; lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the superknowledges is the purity of the sense-sphere of the mind, and the purity of the sense-sphere of the mind is the purity of the knowledge of all modes.

original: de ltar na mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /🔽gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /🔽gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: Thus, the purity of the superknowledges, the purity of the sense-sphere of the mind, and the purity of the knowledge of all modes are not two and not divided, not broken apart, not cut apart, not different.

original: mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the sense-field of mental objects is the purity of the knowledge of all modes.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the knowledge of all modes is the purity of the sense-field of mental objects.🔽Thus, Subhuti, this purity, i.e. the purity of the sense-field of mental objects and the purity of the knowledge of all modes, is one single purity which is not two and cannot be made two.🔽The purity of the sense-field of mental objects is the purity of the sense-field of the mind.🔽The purity of the sense-field of the mind is the purity of the sense-field of phenomena.🔽The purity of the sense-field of phenomena is the purity of the sense-field of the mental organ.

original: de ltar na mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /🔽gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //🔽mngon par shes pa rnam @52a *//

translated: The purity of the sense-field of the mental organ is the purity of the sense-field of the sense-field of mental consciousness.🔽The purity of the sense-field of mental consciousness is the purity of the sense-field of eye.🔽The purity of the sense-field of eye is the purity of the sense-field of ear.🔽The purity of the sense-field of ear is the purity of the sense-field of nose.

original: par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the sense-field of nose is the purity of the sense-field of tongue.🔽The purity of the sense-field of tongue is the purity of the sense-field of body.🔽The purity of the sense-field of body is the purity of the sense-field of form.🔽The purity of the sense-field of form is the purity of the sense-field of sound.🔽The purity of the sense-field of sound is the purity of the sense-field of smell.🔽The purity of the sense-field of smell is the purity of the sense-field of taste.🔽The purity of the sense-field of taste is the purity of the sense-field of touch.🔽The purity of the sense-field of touch is the purity of the sense-field of factors.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /

translated: Thus, the purification of the superknowledges and the purification of the sensory element of the mental faculty and the purification of omniscience are without two, are not divided, are not cut, and do not waver.🔽“The purification of the superknowledges is the purification of the sensory element of the eye.

analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pas mig gi 'dus te reg ba'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purification of the sensory element of the eye is the purification of omniscience.🔽Thus, the purification of the superknowledges and the purification of the sensory element of the eye and the purification of omniscience are without two, are not divided, are not cut, and do not waver.🔽“The purification of the superknowledges is the purification of the sensory element of sights.
