translated: Thus, the purity of the dhāraṇī gateway, the purity of the mental consciousness, and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are without duality and cannot be made dual. They are not separate and are not distinct.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag @61b pa; mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag @61b pa; mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste / de ltar na gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: The purity of the dhāraṇī gateway is the purity of eye contact. The purity of eye contact is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: Thus, the purity of the dhāraṇī gateway, the purity of eye contact, and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are without duality and cannot be made dual. They are not separate and are not distinct.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa; rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa; rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The dhāraṇī gateway is pure due to the purity of the ear sense-sphere, and the ear sense-sphere is pure due to the purity of the dhāraṇī gateway.

original: de ltar na gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purity of the dhāraṇī gateway and the purity of the ear sense-sphere and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are indivisible.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //🔽gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do // gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: They are not two, nor are they divided, nor are they otherwise.🔽The dhāraṇī gateway is pure due to the purity of the nose sense-sphere,

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: and the nose sense-sphere is pure due to the purity of the dhāraṇī gateway.

original: de ltar na gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purification of the dhāraṇī gateway and the purification of the sensory element of the nose are indivisible.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: There is no duality to be found in them.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purification of the dhāraṇī gateway and the purification of the sensory element of the tongue are indivisible.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam @62a *//
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste / de ltar na gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam @62a *//
translated: The purification of the sensory element of the tongue and the purification of omniscience are indivisible.

original: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

translated: Thus, the purification of the dhāraṇī gateway, the purification of the sensory element of the tongue, and the purification of omniscience are indivisible.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: There is no duality to be found in them.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purification of the dhāraṇī gateway and the purification of the sensory element of the body are indivisible.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /

analyzed: de ltar na gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purity of the dhāraṇī-door and the purity of the sense-field of the body and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are without duality,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: and cannot be made dual. They are not separate and not distinct.

analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /

analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the knowledge of all aspects is due to the purity of the sense-field of the mind.

original: de ltar na gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purity of the dhāraṇī-door and the purity of the sense-field of the mind and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are without duality,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: and cannot be made dual. They are not separate and not distinct.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the perfection of skillful means is the purity of the perfection of aspiration.🔽The purity of the perfection of aspiration is the purity of the perfection of strength.🔽The purity of the perfection of strength is the purity of the perfection of knowledge.🔽The purity of the perfection of knowledge is the purity of the perfection of inner emptiness.🔽The purity of the perfection of inner emptiness is the purity of the perfection of outer emptiness.🔽The purity of the perfection of outer emptiness is the purity of the perfection of inner and outer emptiness.

analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /

translated: Thus, the purification of the dhāraṇī gateway and the purification of the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects are indivisible.

analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //

translated: The purity of the sense field of tastes is the purity of the sense field of the tongue.🔽Thus, Subhūti, the purity of the sense field of the tongue and the purity of the sense field of tastes are not two and are not divided.🔽The purity of the sense field of the body is the purity of the sense field of tangibles.

translated: The purity of the sense field of tangibles is the purity of the sense field of the body.🔽Thus, Subhūti, the purity of the sense field of the body and the purity of the sense field of tangibles are not two and are not divided.🔽The purity of the sense field of the mind is the purity of the sense field of mental phenomena.🔽The purity of the sense field of mental phenomena is the purity of the sense field of the mind.

original: gnyis su med de /
analyzed: gnyis su med de /

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: Thus, Subhūti, the purity of the eye and the purity of form are not two and are not divided.🔽The purity of the ear is the purity of sound.🔽The purity of sound is the purity of the ear.🔽Thus, Subhūti, the purity of the ear and the purity of sound are not two and are not divided.🔽The purity of the nose is the purity of smell.🔽The purity of smell is the purity of the nose.🔽Thus, Subhūti, the purity of the nose and the purity of smell are not two and are not divided.🔽The purity of the tongue is the purity of taste.

analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /

analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of mental phenomena is the purity of the mind.🔽Thus,

analyzed: de ltar na gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purification of the dhāraṇī gateway and the purification of the feeling that arises from the condition of the coming together of the eye, form, and consciousness are indivisible.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not two, nor are they divided.🔽The purification of the dhāraṇī gateway is the purification of the feeling that arises from the condition of the coming together of the eye, form, and consciousness.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam par dag pas gzugs rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam par dag pas gzugs rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the powers of the tathāgatas is the purity of form.

original: gzugs rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of form is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la @63b gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la @63b gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purity of the powers of the tathāgatas and the purity of form and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are one thing, not two, not divided.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not broken apart, not cut apart, and not cut asunder.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam par dag pas tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam par dag pas tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the powers of the tathāgatas is the purity of feeling.

original: tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of feeling is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa dang / tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa dang / tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purity of the powers of the tathāgatas and the purity of feeling and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are one thing, not two, not divided.

original: gnyis su bya med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su bya med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: It is not a duality but is not multiple, and is not non-distinct.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam par dag pas 'du shes rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the Tathāgata’s powers is the purity of perception.

original: 'du shes rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: 'du shes rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of perception is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

translated: Thus, the purity of the Tathāgata’s powers and the purity of perception and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two but indivisible,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: not multiple, and not non-distinct.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam par dag pas 'du byed rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the Tathāgata’s powers is the purity of volitional factors.

original: 'du byed rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: 'du byed rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /

analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: “Pure fearlessness is the purity of body contact.

analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the knowledge of all aspects is the purity of the purity of the body sense-sphere.🔽Thus, the purity of fearlessness and the purity of the body sense-sphere and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are without duality and not made dual, are not separate and not cut off.🔽The purity of the knowledge of all aspects is the purity of the purity of the mind sense-sphere.🔽The purity of the mind sense-sphere is the purity of the purity of the phenomena sense-sphere.🔽The purity of the phenomena sense-sphere is the purity of the purity of the eye constituent.

original: de ltar na mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /🔽gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: de ltar na mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de / gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: The purity of the eye constituent is the purity of the purity of the ear constituent.🔽The purity of the ear constituent is the purity of the purity of the nose constituent.🔽The purity of the nose constituent is the purity of the purity of the tongue constituent.🔽The purity of the tongue constituent is the purity of the purity of the body constituent.🔽The purity of the body constituent is the purity of the purity of the thinking-mind constituent.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the thinking-mind constituent is the purity of the purity of the form constituent.🔽The purity of the form constituent is the purity of the purity of the sound constituent.🔽The purity of the sound constituent is the purity of the purity of the smell constituent.🔽The purity of the smell constituent is the purity of the purity of the taste constituent.🔽The purity of the taste constituent is the purity of the purity of the tangible object constituent.🔽The purity of the tangible object constituent is the purity of the purity of the dharma constituent.🔽The purity of the dharma constituent is the purity of the purity of the eye base.🔽The purity of the eye base is the purity of the purity of the form base.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the form base is the purity of the purity of the eye consciousness constituent.🔽The purity of the eye consciousness constituent is the purity of the purity of the ear base.🔽The purity of the ear base is the purity of the purity of the sound base.🔽The purity of the sound base is the purity of the purity of the ear consciousness constituent.

original: de ltar na mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam @73a *//
analyzed: de ltar na mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam @73a *//
translated: The purity of the ear consciousness constituent is the purity of the purity of the nose base.🔽The purity of the nose base is the purity of the purity of the smell base.🔽The purity of the smell base is the purity of the purity of the nose consciousness constituent.

translated: Since contact at the eye is pure, the knowledge of all aspects is pure.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //🔽mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do // mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: Thus, fearlessness and the purity of contact at the eye and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are indivisible, not two, and do not differentiate them.🔽Since fearlessness is pure, contact at the ear is pure.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: Since contact at the ear is pure, the knowledge of all aspects is pure.

translated: “Pure fearlessness and pure feeling conditioned by the sensory contact of the body are not two and are not divided.🔽Pure feeling conditioned by the sensory contact of the body and pure omniscience are not two and are not divided.🔽Thus, pure fearlessness, pure feeling conditioned by the sensory contact of the body, and pure omniscience are not two and are not divided.🔽“Pure fearlessness and pure feeling conditioned by the sensory contact of the mind are not two and are not divided.🔽Pure feeling conditioned by the sensory contact of the mind and pure omniscience are not two and are not divided.🔽Thus, pure fearlessness, pure feeling conditioned by the sensory contact of the mind, and pure omniscience are not two and are not divided.🔽“Pure fearlessness and pure feeling conditioned by sensory contact with the eye are not two and are not divided.🔽Pure feeling conditioned by sensory contact with the eye and pure omniscience are not two and are not divided.🔽Thus, pure fearlessness, pure feeling conditioned by sensory contact with the eye, and pure omniscience are not two and are not divided.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: “Pure fearlessness and pure feeling conditioned by sensory contact with the ear are not two and are not divided.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: Pure feeling conditioned by sensory contact with the ear and pure omniscience are not two and are not divided.🔽Thus, pure fearlessness, pure feeling conditioned by sensory contact with the ear, and pure omniscience are not two and are not divided.🔽“Pure fearlessness and pure feeling conditioned by sensory contact with the nose are not two and are not divided.🔽Pure feeling conditioned by sensory contact with the nose and pure omniscience are not two and are not divided.🔽Thus, pure fearlessness, pure feeling conditioned by sensory contact with the nose, and pure omniscience are not two and are not divided.

analyzed: de ltar na mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pa dang / sna'i @73b 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /🔽gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: “Pure fearlessness and pure feeling conditioned by sensory contact with the body are not two and are not divided.🔽Pure feeling conditioned by sensory contact with the body and pure

original: mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the sense field of tastes is the purity of the sense field of the tongue.🔽The purity of the sense field of the tongue is the purity of the sense field of mental phenomena.🔽The purity of the sense field of mental phenomena is the purity of the sense field of the mind.🔽The purity of the sense field of the mind is the purity of the sense field of contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste; de ltar na mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang /🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de; gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste; de ltar na mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de; gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: The purity of the sense field of contact is the purity of the sense field of feeling.🔽The purity of the sense field of feeling is the purity of the sense field of craving.🔽The purity of the sense field of craving is the purity of the sense field of appropriation.🔽The purity of the sense field of appropriation is the purity of the sense field of existence.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the sense field of existence is the purity of the sense field of birth.🔽The purity of the sense field of birth is the purity of the sense field of old age and death.🔽The purity of the sense field of old age and death is the purity of the perfection of giving.🔽The purity of the perfection of giving is the purity of the perfection of morality.🔽The purity of the perfection of morality is the purity of the perfection of patience.🔽The purity of the perfection of patience is the purity of the perfection of perseverance.🔽The purity of the perfection of perseverance is the purity of the perfection of concentration.🔽The purity of the perfection of concentration is the purity of the perfection of wisdom.🔽The purity of the perfection of wisdom is the purity of the perfection of skillful means.🔽The purity of the perfection of skillful means is the purity of the perfection of aspiration.🔽The purity of the perfection of aspiration is the purity of the perfection of strength.🔽The purity of the perfection of strength is the purity of the perfection of knowledge.🔽The purity of the perfection of knowledge is the purity of the applications of mindfulness.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the applications of mindfulness is the purity of the right efforts.🔽The purity of the right efforts is the purity of the legs of miraculous power.🔽The purity of the legs of miraculous power is the purity of the five faculties.🔽The purity of the five faculties is the purity of the five powers.🔽The purity of the five powers is the purity of the seven aspects of enlightenment.🔽The purity of the seven aspects of enlightenment is the purity of the noble eightfold path.🔽The purity of the noble eightfold path is the purity of the fruit of stream enterer.

original: de ltar na mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, purified fearlessness and purified feeling conditioned by sensory contact that is mentally compounded are one thing, and purified knowledge of all aspects is another.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: But, in fact, purified fearlessness and purified knowledge of all aspects are not two and are not divided.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: Purified fearlessness is purified feeling conditioned by sensory contact that is mentally compounded.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag @74a *//
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste / de ltar na mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag @74a *//
translated: Purified feeling conditioned by sensory contact that is mentally compounded is purified knowledge of all aspects.

original: pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, purified fearlessness and purified feeling conditioned by sensory contact that is mentally compounded are one thing, and purified knowledge of all aspects is another.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: But, in fact, purified fearlessness and purified knowledge of all aspects are not two and are not divided.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pas gzugs rnam par dag pa /🔽gzugs rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /🔽gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pas gzugs rnam par dag pa / gzugs rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste / de ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de / gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: The purity of the analytical knowledges is the purity of form.🔽The purity of form is the purity of the knowledge of all modes.🔽Thus, the purity of the analytical knowledges and the purity of form and the purity of the knowledge of all modes are not two and not divided, not separated, not broken apart.🔽

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pas tshor ba rnam par dag pa /🔽tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pa dang / tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pas tshor ba rnam par dag pa /🔽tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pa dang / tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: The purity of the knowledge of the teaching, the purity of form, and the purity of the knowledge of all modes are one thing, they are not two, nor are they divided.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not two, nor are they divided, nor are they cut apart.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pas 'du shes rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pas 'du shes rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of discernment is due to the purity of the correct knowledges.

analyzed: 'du shes rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the knowledge of all aspects is due to the purity of discernment.

analyzed: de ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pa dang / 'du shes rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad @74b mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purity of the correct knowledges and the purity of discernment and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two,

analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do // so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pas 'du byed rnam par dag pa /
translated: nor are they divided, nor are they cut apart.🔽The purity of volitional factors is due to the purity of the correct knowledges.

original: 'du byed rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: 'du byed rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the knowledge of all aspects is due to the purity of volitional factors.

original: de ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pa dang / 'du byed rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pa dang / 'du byed rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: The purity of the eye is the purity of omniscience.🔽The purity of the eye is the purity of the formative predispositions.🔽The purity of the formative predispositions is the purity of omniscience.🔽Thus, the purity of the correct understanding of each and every element of knowledge, the purity of the eye, and the purity of omniscience are indivisible.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste / de ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: The purity of the sensory element of the eyes is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //🔽so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do // so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: Thus, Subhūti, the purity of the correct understanding of language and the purity of the sensory element of the eyes and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two, nor are they divided, nor are they discriminated.🔽The purity of the correct understanding of language is the purity of the sensory element of the ears.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the sensory element of the ears is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, pure correct understanding and pure ear-contact are non-dual and not divisible into two.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not disparate.

translated: Pure correct understanding is pure nose-contact.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

translated: Pure nose-contact is pure omniscience.

translated: Thus, pure correct understanding and pure nose-contact and pure omniscience are non-dual and not divisible into two.

translated: The purity of gnosis is the purity of the knowledge of languages.🔽Thus, the purity of the knowledge of languages and the purity of gnosis are indivisible—they cannot be separated or divided.🔽The purity of the knowledge of languages is the purity of the knowledge of the world.🔽The purity of the knowledge of the world is the purity of the knowledge of languages.🔽Thus, the purity of the knowledge of languages and the purity of the knowledge of the world are indivisible—they cannot be separated or divided.🔽The purity of the knowledge of languages is the purity of the knowledge of inspired speech.

analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the knowledge of inspired speech is the purity of the knowledge of languages.🔽Thus, the purity of the knowledge of languages and the purity of the knowledge of inspired speech are indivisible—they cannot be separated or divided.🔽The purity of the knowledge of languages is the purity of the knowledge of discerning wisdom.🔽The purity of the knowledge of discerning wisdom is the purity of the knowledge of languages.🔽Thus, the purity of the knowledge of languages and the purity of the knowledge of discerning wisdom are indivisible—they cannot be separated or divided.

translated: The purity of the knowledge of languages is the purity of the knowledge of the path that leads everywhere.🔽The purity of the knowledge of the path that leads everywhere is the purity of the knowledge of languages.🔽Thus, the purity of the knowledge of languages and the purity of the knowledge of the path that leads everywhere are indivisible—they cannot be separated or divided.🔽The purity of the knowledge of languages is the purity of the knowledge of the cognition of the exhaustion of contaminants.

analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the knowledge of the cognition of the exhaustion of contaminants is the purity of the knowledge of languages.🔽Thus, the purity of the knowledge of languages and the purity of the knowledge of the cognition of the exhaustion of contaminants are indivisible—they cannot be separated or divided.🔽The purity of the knowledge of languages is the purity of the knowledge of the cognition of the way of the path.

translated: Thus, pure correct understanding and pure physical contact are indivisible.

translated: They are not two nor divided.

original: de ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

translated: The purity of the correct understanding of eloquence is the purity of the conditioned arising of contact through the coming together of the eye and form.

translated: Thus, the purity of the correct understanding of eloquence and the purity of the conditioned arising of contact through the coming together of the eye and form and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha ma dad do //🔽so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /

translated: They are not broken apart and are not cut apart.🔽The purity of the correct understanding of eloquence is the purity of the conditioned arising of contact through the coming together of the ear and sound.

translated: Thus, correct understanding is one thing and the purification of contact at the nose as a requisite condition for feeling is another, but the purification of contact at the nose as a requisite condition for feeling and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects are one in the sense that they are not two, nor are they divided.🔽Correct understanding is one thing and the purification of contact at the tongue as a requisite condition for feeling is another, but the purification of contact at the tongue as a requisite condition for feeling and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects are one in the sense that they are not two, nor are they divided.🔽Thus, correct understanding is one thing and the purification of contact at the tongue as a requisite condition for feeling is another, but the purification of contact at the tongue as a requisite condition for feeling and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects are one in the sense that they are not two, nor are they divided.

analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /

analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the applications of mindfulness is the purity of the right efforts.🔽The purity of the right efforts is the purity of the legs of miraculous power.🔽The purity of the legs of miraculous power is the purity of the faculties.🔽The purity of the faculties is the purity of the powers.🔽The purity of the powers is the purity of the branches of enlightenment.

original: de ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

translated: The purity of the branches of enlightenment is the purity of the path.🔽The purity of the path is the purity of the fruit.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: The purity of the fruit is the purity of the result.🔽The purity of the result is the purity of the perfection of giving.🔽The purity of the perfection of giving is the purity of the perfection of morality.🔽The purity of the perfection of morality is the purity of the perfection of patience.🔽The purity of the perfection of patience is the purity of the perfection of effort.🔽The purity of the perfection of effort is the purity of the perfection of meditation.🔽The purity of the perfection of meditation is the purity of the perfection of wisdom.🔽The purity of the perfection of wisdom is the purity of the emptiness of internal phenomena.🔽The purity of the emptiness of internal phenomena is the purity of the emptiness of external phenomena.🔽The purity of the emptiness of external phenomena is the purity of the emptiness of both internal and external phenomena.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par @79b dag pa /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par @79b dag pa /
translated: The purity of the emptiness of both internal and external phenomena is the purity of the emptiness of emptiness.🔽The purity of the emptiness of emptiness is the purity of the emptiness of great extent.🔽The purity of the emptiness of great extent is the purity of the emptiness of ultimate reality.🔽The purity of the emptiness of ultimate reality is the purity of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.🔽The purity of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena is the purity of the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.🔽The purity of the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena is the purity of the emptiness of the unlimited.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /

analyzed: bam po brgya gya gcig pa /
translated: nor are they divided, nor are they broken apart.

analyzed: byams pa chen po rnam par dag pas gzugs rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of great love is the purity of form.
